gradient.svg: <radialGradient id="jointradial" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color: rgb(254, 91, 127); stop-opacity: 1;"></stop><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color: rgb(231, 236, 239); stop-opacity: 1;"></stop></radialGradient>

jointStyle.description: Each joint has 2 ellipses per side - a larger hover area with gradient fill, and a smaller solid center
